name: Norne
description: A volunteer who took up arms in the struggle that consumed her homeland, Altea. She aided Marth's escape when Altea fell. Appears in Fire Emblem: New Mystery of the Emblem.

dialogue.text: Hey there, I'm Norne! I may not look like much, but I know my way around a bow. Say, uh...is Prince Marth here?
Hmm... Why can't I find... This seems like the place... Err... Ugh! Did I lose Kris again?!
After assisting Prince Marth's escape, I just kept on helping the knights. I had my reasons, of course...
Ohmigosh! Were you behind the target I was firing at? Be careful! You're lucky I'm a good shot...
What a big yawn! Up late, were ya? I'm a bit sleepy myself, to tell ya the truth... Time for a quick nap?
Oh, smelled the stew, did ya? Well, you'll only have to wait a bit longer. It's just about ready.
Heya! Sorry for botherin' ya, but I've got this message for ya from your pal <Friend Name>!
Whew! Feelin' good! At this rate, things'll go well for us!
Hmph. My body doesn't want to cooperate today... Guess I'll just have to train it some more!
Ah, geez. Now I've stepped in it... I really am such a klutz...
You're going to trust me with this? Aww, yay! Thank you so much!

Wh-wha— Oh! I thought I was a goner for sure... Thanks for the help! Seems you're always helpin' me out... Y'know, I've been thinkin' that you remind me of Kris, and...I think all your help might be the main reason. Well, that MAY be what it is... But I don't want it to be you who always helps me... Lemme return the favor! I know! When all this fighting is over, I'll take you to visit my village! I think you'll feel right at home there... And when we get there, I'll make ya, hands down, the best meal you've ever eaten—believe you me!

origin: Fire Emblem: Mystery of the Emblem
